headline: Bank Of New York Mellon Preferred Issue Reshapes Income And Capital Stack
summary: Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (NYSE:BK) completed a $500 million preferred stock offering. The offering involves 6.250% Fixed Rate Reset Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series I. BNY indicated it may redeem its outstanding Series F and Series H Preferred Stock in 2026, subject to conditions. Bank of New York Mellon Corporation, a major global custodian and asset servicing bank, often uses preferred stock as part of its long term funding mix. This new $500 million Series I issuance...
